svg:
<% view.original_view.curves.each_with_index do |curve, index| %> <circle cx="0" cy="<%= index * 30 %>" r="5" fill="<%= view.curve_stylings[index]["stroke"] %>" transform="translate(20, 20)" />
<text x="0" y="<%= 30 * index %>" font-size="1.5em" id="axis-<%= index %>" font-family="Cantarell" transform="translate(40, 30)"> <%= curve.text %>
<% end %>
<%= view.original_view.ordinate_axis.name %>
<%= view.original_view.abscissa_axis.name %>
<% view.original_view.ordinate_axis.number_labels.reverse.each_with_index do |label, index| %> <text x="0" y="<%= calculate_y_placement_of_ordinate_label(index) %>" transform="translate(90, 100)" text-anchor="end"> <%= l = label.round(3); (l.to_s.size) > 7 ? ("%.1e" % l) : l %>
<path d="M 0 <%= calculate_y_placement_of_ordinate_gridline(index) %> L 700 <%= calculate_y_placement_of_ordinate_gridline(index) %>" style="fill:none; stroke:#000000; stroke-width:0.8985; stroke-dasharray:5,5" transform = "translate(100, 100)" /> <% end %>
<% view.original_view.abscissa_axis.number_labels.each_with_index do |label, index| %> <text x="<%= calculate_x_placement_of_abscissa_label(index) %>" y="0" transform="translate(100, 820)" text-anchor="middle"> <%= l = label.round(3); (l.to_s.size) > 7 ? ("%.1e" % l) : l %>
<path d="M <%= calculate_x_placement_of_abscissa_gridline(index) %> 0 L <%= calculate_x_placement_of_abscissa_gridline(index) %> 700" style="fill:none; stroke:#000000; stroke-width:0.8985; stroke-dasharray:5,5" transform = "translate(100, 100)" /> <% end %>
<% view.original_view.curves.each_with_index do |curve, index| %> <path id="curve-number-<%= index %>" d=" M <%= join_expression_point(curve.path.first) %> L <% curve.path.each do |expression_data_point| %> <%= join_expression_point(expression_data_point) %> <% end %> " style="<%= cssify_style(view.curve_stylings[index]) %>" transform=" translate(<%= 100 + multiply_by_grid_unit_size(view.original_view.abscissa_axis.origin) %>, <%= 100 + multiply_by_grid_unit_size(view.original_view.ordinate_axis.origin) %>) scale(<%= grid_unit_size %>) " /> <% end %>
<% if view.show_total_area_aid %>
<% end %>
